# Raw HTML

## Details / Summary

<details>
<summary>Click to expand</summary>

This content is hidden by default.

- Item A
- Item B
- Item C

```go
fmt.Println("inside details")
```

</details>

## Colored Text

<span style="color: red;">Red text</span>, <span style="color: blue;">blue text</span>, and <span style="color: green;">green text</span>.

## Keyboard Input

Press <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>C</kbd> to stop the server.

## Superscript / Subscript

H<sub>2</sub>O is water. E = mc<sup>2</sup>.

## Div with Alignment

<div align="center">

**Centered content**

This paragraph is centered using a div.

</div>

## Badges (img in HTML)

<p>
  <a href="https://github.com"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Go-1.21-blue" alt="Go Version"></a>
  <a href="https://github.com"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-green" alt="License"></a>
</p>
